abstract: In the United States, industry experts caution that 2011 will be a tougher year, even though a 30 percent tax credit is to continue until the end of 2016.
snippet: In the United States, industry experts caution that 2011 will be a tougher year, even though a 30 percent tax credit is to continue until the end of 2016.
lead_paragraph: Government incentives have spurred a big increase in the adoption of small wind turbines by homes and businesses, Kate Galbraith reports. In Britain, she notes, a feed-in tariff introduced last year promises operators of small wind turbines above-market rates for the power they produce.
